Class DistributedMEEvolutionState

java.lang.Object
ec.EvolutionState
ec.distributedME.DistributedMEEvolutionState
All Implemented Interfaces:
Setup, Singleton, Serializable
public class DistributedMEEvolutionState extends EvolutionState
DistributedMEEvolutionState.java

1.0

See Also:
  • Repurposes the EvolutionState for MAP-Elites. Created: 10 February, 2022

    • replacementProbability

      public double replacementProbability
      When a new individual arrives, with what probability should it directly replace the existing "marked for death" individual, as opposed to only replacing it if it's superior? Only considered when two individuals have the same fitness.

    • exchanger

      DistributedMEExchanger exchanger
      MAP exchanger, a singleton object. You should only access in a read-only fashion.

    • setup

      public void setup(EvolutionState state, Parameter base)
      Description copied from class: EvolutionState
      Unlike for other setup() methods, ignore the base; it will always be null.
      Specified by:
      setup in interface Setup
      Overrides:
      setup in class EvolutionState

    • startFresh

      public void startFresh()
      Overrides:
      startFresh in class EvolutionState

    • evolve

      public int evolve()
      Evolution process Sets up the statistics, breeder, and evaluator if its the first evaluation. Goes through each submap per evaluation.
      Overrides:
      evolve in class EvolutionState

    • ProcessIndividual

      protected void ProcessIndividual(Elite e, int submap)
      Abstracted out of the evolution loop unlike SteadyState so that the exchanger can use this. Want exchanger to also evaluate to avoid looping through the entire map and looking for the evaluated flag.
      See Also:
      • SteadyStateEvolutionState.evolve()
